metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3549 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: An out of bounds flaw was found in GNU binutils objdump utility version 2.36. An attacker could use this flaw and pass a large section to avr_elf32_load_records_from_section() probably resulting in a crash or in some cases memory corruption. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to integrity as well as system availability.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> od-elf32_avr.c is not built in the Ubuntu package

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
